question: Can a girl live throughout her life without getting marry?
answer:
QUESTION
I love a male, he also loves me alot but both of us couldn't get marry due to some reasons and now we have decided that we will never get marry to someonelese because it is dishonesty to love one and marry other. Is it permissible if not then why?
ANSWER


Share:
The mutual promise between the boy and girl not to marry another person as
it will be dishonest to do so is baseless. If one has the urge to marry, it
is compulsory upon her to marry and protect his/her chastity.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
